Material used.Description: Cells stably expressing DMT1 and mutant α-synuclein

Readout description.Result Description: Decreased cell viability in cells with mutant α-synuclein and increased Fe2+ uptake.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned but implied by the experimental design.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cells were used as a control.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells without DMT1 expression or mutant α-synuclein were used as controls.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Not explicitly mentioned but implied by the experimental design.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability greater than 80% (assumed based on standard thresholds).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability less than 50% (assumed based on standard thresholds).
